title: En Veetula Lyrics Idharkuthane Aasaipattai Balakumara Lyrics
stanzas: <div>Movie:Idharkuthane Aasaipattai Balakumara, Music:Siddharth Vipin, Singer: Gaana Bala, Lyrics:Lalithanad,

En veetula naan irundheney,
Edhir veetula ava irundhLey.
Love torture panna ennaku theriyala.
Ava daddy moonji sariyila,
Ava mummy pechum pudikala,
Anaalum avala naan marakka mudiyala,
Naan love aala pala bulbu
Vaanguna paiyaan,
Athanaala en life-u oli veesudhey
Ava pinnaala kooda ponneney
Love-a solla,
China phone-ula signal illa ,
Pochey Ada vada pochey.

London bridge is falling down-u
London bridge is Falling ,
London bridge is Falling,

falling down-u
Edhukumey time illa,
Sulatitaa kedikaara mulla,

Kaathaadi pola manasu
Kaathodu ponadhey,
Medhandhu megam thottu,
Maatikichu satellite-la .
